Updating the Config File

  • Set the base URL and guide name
  • Copy the exclude: entries
  • Register new pages
  • Update the repository list
  • Set google_analytics_ua

Once you're finished updating the config file, click the GitHub Setup entry in the table of contents.

Set the base URL and guide name

The configuration file is called _config.yml. The first properties to update are baseurl:, which determines the top-level URL of your guide relative to the host; and name:, which appears as the guide's overall title. Make sure to set baseurl: to the name of your new guide's repository; this is important to ensure that it will be published correctly.

For example, for this template, these values are set to:

baseurl: /APIPrototype
name: My Medication List - Prototype

When run locally, the URL for this guide is http://localhost:4000/APIPrototype/. Remember to include the trailing / when serving locally! The Jekyll built-in webserver doesn't redirect to it automatically.

The URLs of the individual section pages are relative to the baseurl:. For example, the permalink: of this page is /updating-the-config-file/. The full local URL is http://localhost:4000/APIPrototype/updating-the-config-file/.

Copy the exclude: entries

Make sure that you update the exclude: list to contain at least the following files so that they are not copied to your generated _site directory:

exclude:
- go
- Gemfile
- Gemfile.lock
- README.md
- LICENSE.md

Register new pages

The navigation: list is used to generate the table of contents. Add a new entry for any new page added. For example, the navigation: section of this guide contains:

navigation:
- text: Introduction
  url: index.html
  internal: true
- text: How we built it
  url: how-we-built-it/
  internal: true
- text: Methodology
  url: methodology/
  internal: true
- text: Design
  url: design/
  internal: true
- text: Development
  url: development/
  internal: true
- text: Testing
  url: testing/
  internal: true
- text: Deployment
  url: deployment/
  internal: true
- text: Configuration Management
  url: configuration-management/
  internal: true
- text: Continuous Integration
  url: continuous-integration/
  internal: true
- text: Continuous Monitoring
  url: continuous-monitoring/
  internal: true
- text: Security
  url: security/
  internal: true
- text: Miscellaneous
  url: miscellaneous/
  internal: true
- text: RFQ Evidence
  url: rfq-evaluation-criteria-evidence/
  internal: true
- text: Open License
  url: open-license/
  internal: true

Update the repository list

You will also need to update the repos: list to reflect the GitHub repository containing your guide. The repos: entry of this template contains:

repos:
- name: Guides Template
  description: Main repository
  url: https://github.com/goswamivijay/APIPrototype

Set google_analytics_ua

Set google_analytics_ua to the following, if it isn't set already:

google_analytics_ua: UA-64764688-1
